landing.description: Welcome to CodeInsight, the ultimate destination for code execution and analysis. Our platform is designed with developers in mind, offering unparalleled support for a wide range of programming languages. With our intuitive interface and powerful features, you can quickly execute your code and analyze its performance, identifying opportunities for optimization and improvement

auth.password_rules: Your password must contain one digit from 0 to 9, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one special character, no spaces, and must be 8-32 characters long.

errors.backend_connection_error: Error connecting to the server API
errors.unauthorized: You need to be logged in to perform this action
errors.invalid_password: Your password does not meet the requirements
